snippet: The former N.F.L. quarterback Ryan Leaf has been moved from a central Montana drug treatment center after violating the conditions of the placement.
lead_paragraph: The former N.F.L. quarterback Ryan Leaf has been moved from a central Montana drug treatment center after violating the conditions of the placement.

headline.seo: Ryan Leaf Kicked Out of Drug Treatment Center
headline.main: Leaf Kicked Out of Drug Treatment Center
